Rhythm

Some cool rhythm stuff. Still need to add.

  • The Rhythm class

  • The Melody

  • The RhythmTrial class

class combio.rhythm.Rhythm(iois, n_bars: int, time_signature, beat_ms)[source]
classmethod from_iois(iois, time_signature, beat_ms)[source]
classmethod from_note_values(note_values, time_signature=(4, 4), beat_ms=500)[source]

Almost same as standard initialization, except that we don’t provide the number of bars but calculate those.

classmethod generate_isochronous(n_bars, time_signature, beat_ms)[source]
classmethod generate_random_rhythm(allowed_note_values, n_bars=1, time_signature=(4, 4), beat_ms=500, events_per_bar=None, rng=None)[source]

This function returns a randomly generated integer ratio Sequence on the basis of the provided params.

property note_values

Get note values from the IOIs, based on beat_ms.

Parameters

  • filepath –

  • print_staff –

  • lilypond_percussion_notes – List of lilypond percussion notes for each layer. Defaults to [‘bd’, ‘snare’, ‘hihat’]. See possible options here: https://lilypond.org/doc/v2.23/Documentation/notation/percussion-notes
